sentences.english: The restaurant offers dishes especially for Chinese New Year.
sentences.chinese: 餐厅提供寓意吉祥的贺年美食。

sentences.english: I bought some Lottery PC from Beijing and sent them to Korea.
sentences.chinese: 我从北京买了一些贺年片，并且直接从北京寄往韩国。

sentences.english: I gave him a New Year card, which he enjoyed very much.
sentences.chinese: 我给他一张贺年卡，他很喜欢它。

sentences.english: Nigar has donated several greeting card designs and calendar cartoons for charities .
sentences.chinese: 尼嘉还捐赠了许多贺年片以及卡通年历用作慈善。

sentences.english: It's past the25th, and I have not written a single new year's card.
sentences.chinese: 已经过了二十五号，我贺年片一张都还没写。

sentences.english: And obviously we all send out Christmas card and New Year's card at the same time.
sentences.chinese: 当然，我们还将圣诞卡和贺年卡一起发出去。

sentences.english: I still cannot put my finger on who wrote me that card.
sentences.chinese: 说了这么多，我还是不能确定那张贺年卡是谁寄来的。

sentences.english: Folded New Year card should be sent as a letter.
sentences.chinese: 折叠的贺年卡应该按信函交寄。

sentences.english: I gave her mooncakes on Mid-Autumn Festivals, presents during Chinese New Year.
sentences.chinese: 中秋节我送她月饼，农历新年我送她贺年礼物。

sentences.english: Which food item do you like eating in Chinese New Year?
sentences.chinese: 你最喜欢吃新年那一种贺年食品？

definition: to pay a New Year call/to wish sb a Happy New Year
to exchange compliments on New Year's Day
double happiness/the combined symmetric character 囍 (similar to 喜喜) as symbol of good luck, esp. marriage
congratulate an elderly person on his birthday/offer birthday felicitations
Fenglin town in Hualien County 花蓮縣|花莲县[Hua1 lian2 Xian4], east Taiwan
May you have a prosperous New Year! (New Year's greeting)
(old) dowager/old lady (title for the mother of a noble or an official)
